If you discover a security issue, please report it privately to us as soon as possible.

ğŸš¨ DO NOT open a public GitHub issue for security vulnerabilities. Instead, follow these steps:

âŠ ğŸ“© Send an email to [security@fox-techniques.com](mailto:security@fox-techniques.com) Include as many details as possible (e.g., steps to reproduce, potential impact).

â‹ â³ We aim to respond within **3 business days**. Weâ€™ll acknowledge receipt, assess the issue, and provide updates.
